name: Masks Mandatory
description:
Synopsis:

You are a convenience store clerk tasked with keeping their store clean and repaired. However, some customers don’t want to wear masks – you must balance their store responsibilities while throwing masks at customers to ensure they don’t get your coworker sick.

If too many maskless customer reaches your vulnerable coworker at the register or your store goes unattended for too long, it's game over!

*Note - We had a small bug that happens after the lose/win screens. When you replay the game will be frozen. You can quickly fix this by hitting (ESC) and Play. The level will then start. Sorry for the extra hoops!

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Left Click To Throw Masks
  • Right Click to perform tasks

Credits:

  • Jacob Nowak - Game Design & UI
  • Kevin Bryan - Programming & Vfx
  • Catherine Levine - Production and Audio Design
  • Devon Gregory - System Programming
  • Samuel Daman - AI Programming
  • Grace Gilbert - Environment & Asset Art
  • B Benavides - UI & Character Art
  • Alexius Rodriguez - Asset Art
